body_html:
Now bash is just exiting out to windows console during ./configure command looks something went wrong with setting up python library path.

pavel@brans /C/tensorflow
$ ./configure
/C/tensorflow /C/tensorflow
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /c/Python27/python]: /i/Anaconda3/python
Found possible Python library paths:
I:\Anaconda3
I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [I:\Anaconda3]
/i/Anaconda3/libs/python35.lib

ERROR: Invalid python library path: /i/Anaconda3/libs/python35.lib.

pavel@brans /C/tensorflow
$ ./configure
/C/tensorflow /C/tensorflow
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /c/Python27/python]: /i/Anaconda3/python
Found possible Python library paths:
I:\Anaconda3
I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [I:\Anaconda3]
/i/Anaconda3/libs/
Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.14393] (here the bash existed)
(c) 2016 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

body:
Now bash is just exiting out to windows console during  ./configure command looks something went wrong with setting up python library path.

pavel@brans  /C/tensorflow
$ ./configure
/C/tensorflow /C/tensorflow
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /c/Python27/python]: /i/Anaconda3/python
Found possible Python library paths:
  I:\Anaconda3
  I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [I:\Anaconda3]
/i/Anaconda3/libs/python35.lib


ERROR: Invalid python library path: /i/Anaconda3/libs/python35.lib.

pavel@brans  /C/tensorflow
$ ./configure
/C/tensorflow /C/tensorflow
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /c/Python27/python]: /i/Anaconda3/python
Found possible Python library paths:
  I:\Anaconda3
  I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [I:\Anaconda3]
/i/Anaconda3/libs/
Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.14393] **(here the bash existed)**
(c) 2016 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
